scripts.build:all: npm run build:functions && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix dashboard && npm install --prefix functions
scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting: npm run build --prefix dashboard && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix dashboard && npm run lint --prefix functions
scripts.clean: rm -rf dashboard/.output dashboard/.nuxt functions/lib node_modules dashboard/node_modules functions/node_modules
